thread.title: Who wants to visit Seychelles ? The island's Minister meets 2015 beauty queens
thread.title_full: Who wants to visit Seychelles ? The island's Minister meets 2015 beauty queens

author: Assignment Editor
title: Who wants to visit Seychelles ? The island's Minister meets 2015 beauty queens
text:
Who wants to visit Seychelles ? The island's Minister meets 2015 beauty queens   30, 2015 eTN   
Seychelles is the dream holiday destination and it is clear that these islands continue to be the ultimate destination for the Who's Who in the World. At the Tourism Trade Fair in Paris the island's Minister responsible for Tourism and Culture, Alain St.Ange was one who heard from 2015 Beauty Queens from France and Tahiti and also Miss World France that Seychelles is the destination they want to visit for their holidays. 
The Seychelles Minister is in Paris for Top Resa Tourism Trade Fair 2015 and met the Beauty Queens soon after his arrival in Paris after an overnight flight from the Seychelles. 
Teasing the journalists present at this photo opportunity Minister Alain St.Ange of the Seychelles simply said:- "Their are two groups of holiday makers these days, those who have been to paradise and spent their holidays in Seychelles and those who have not yet discovered the ultimate for a dream holiday".
